law.catch_line: The Board shall issue a certificate to any applicant who meets the requirements of this title....

text.section: The Board shall issue a certificate to any applicant who meets the requirements of this title.

The Board shall include on each certificate that the Board issues:
The full name of the certificate holder;
A serial number; and
The seal of the Board.
The Board may issue a certificate to replace a lost, destroyed, or mutilated certificate if the certificate holder pays the certificate replacement fee set by the Board.
